@realawesomedude, I hope that you read this. 

At first I had planned that I dont watch this movie. 
But after I read your comment I was like "WTF! I cant miss this". 
So I watched the movie...

You say you hate this movie and that its discriminating men and that it undignifies us. 

But you didnt say why? Ppl here dont get your point besides that you really hate it. 

I was angry too after watching this. At the way they portrait our history. 
And I 100% agree with you on the Owen Wilson thing. And I'm very disappinted with his acting here. I mean smart and talented men shouldnt take shit from stuck up bitches, specially from cunts like his fiance. I mean the guy she had an affair with, I wanted Owen to punch the shit out of him then bitch slap his wife. 

I was mostly disappointed that Owen didnt have sex with atleast 5 ladys.

Still I liked this movie.. why? 
1. He wasnt crazy in the end.
2. The spy made me LMFAO. 
3. He still is rich, smart, talented and he can travel through time. how awesome is that? 
4. The movie ended with him walking to home a girl 10 years younger and much prettier than his ex-fiance. 

Life goes on...
